author: damitha
msg: Changes for the linux build process to make it simpler

author: gawor
msg: moved initialization code to init function. fixes problem where the real handler would sometimes be skipped if the same JAXRPC handler was called from multiple threads at the same time

author: hawkeye
msg: Previously soap headers could be got by name, but there was no way to
iterate through them all. This fix adds in getFirstHeaderBlock and
getNextHeaderBlock methods to IHandlerSoapSerializer, allowing a handler to
iterate through all the soap headers.
Submitted by: hawkeye on behalf of Mark Whitlock

author: hawkeye
msg: This fix enables a handler to get the value of an attribute from a header.
Previously there was no way for a handler to get attribute values from a
Submitted by: hawkeye on behalf of Mark Whitlock

author: hawkeye
msg: Allowed handler to set and get void properties
Submitted by: hawkeye on behalf of Mark Whitlock
